sustainable_solutions: ['Instead of fungicides, use baking soda or vinegar to avoid killing beneficial soil microbes.', 'Implement the practice of thinning your trees in order to limit competition for resources and reduce the risk of fires.']

['Instead of fungicides, use baking soda or vinegar to avoid killing beneficial soil microbes.', 'Plant and breed hybrid seeds to maximize crop yields while reducing usage of water and chemical inputs.']

['Instead of fungicides, use baking soda or vinegar to avoid killing beneficial soil microbes.', 'Use organic fertilizer instead of synthetic fertilizer to prevent releasing greenhouse gas emissions.', 'Composting diverts organic waste from landfills and improves soil quality.']

['Instead of fungicides, use baking soda or vinegar to avoid killing beneficial soil microbes.', 'Prune your trees and bushes to increase soil fertility, balance the root systems, and prevent the spread of diseases.', 'Utilize cultivars to reduce reliance on chemicals and maximize crop yields.']
